shadow.name: PSYCHOSIS
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Inner Truth, expressing through psychosis

gift.name: INSPIRATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Inner Truth, expressing through inspiration

siddhi.name: SANCTITY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Inner Truth, expressing through sanctity

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 61 shadow frequency. The psychosis you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural inspiration. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from psychosis to inspiration.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your head. Notice the sensation of psychosis.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 61 consciously for 7 days, the psychosis pattern will shift toward inspiration.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 61 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from psychosis toward inspiration
